name: Hanglip Mountain Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an amazing property in the midst of the Entabeni Game Reserve. As you look out your window you will see animals of all kinds. We saw giraffes walking by, wildebeest grazing, and young lions on the hunt. The room was so nice, and the staff was incredible. Trevor was our game ranger, and he was so knowledgeable and personable. The kitchen staff created really good meals and also came out to sing to us. We were there only two nights, but wanted to stay for a week. If you can swing getting here do not hesitate. We were on a tour, but this location is good for all.
reviews.title: An Amazing Adventure in a Magical Location

reviews.text: What a fantastic place, at less than 3 hours drive from Johannesburg; a great resort where in 3 game drives I saw much more animals than anytime before in this span of time. Elephants, leopards, cheteas, impalas, wildebeest, giraffe, hypo's, rhino's, white beers, they just were to be seen at very vlosse distance. The jeeps are very confortable and the rangers very knowledgeable with a good eye to spot the animals. They care for the nature too. The lodge is a delight: a lot of space, good beds, a lovely bathroom and nice balcony. From that you have a beautiful view of the mountains. The food was awesome, what a good cooks. All the staff was very friendly and helpful. My next visit to a wildpark will be again to Entabeni.
reviews.title: Wonderfull place with very knowledgeable rangers

reviews.text: These individual lodges were great as was the evening meals allowing to taste some African cuisine. We saw 4 of the big 5 on our morning and afternoon safaris, sadly the elusive leopard was not spotted! The rangers were fun and incredibly knowledgeable and the scenery was breathtaking. We were able to organise a hot air balloon ride with Bill Harrop's Original Balloon Safari which was amazing.
reviews.title: A lovely stay!

reviews.text: Spent a day at Hangklip! What a place! Great service, great food, awesome room, and ask for Trevor to take you on a game drive! We took an evening and morning game drive and saw lion, elephant, rhino and various antelope. Trevor is an amazing guide!
reviews.title: Wow!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 2 nights in Entabeni Hanglip Mountain Lodge. The accommodation was great, food was great and we did wonderful Safari Game Drives! The Ranger Sean was great too! Only positive memories! We saw a lot of animals: leons, rhinos, cheetahs, wildebeest, impala, niala, hypo's, croco's, elephants... most of the animals were on very close distance! The lodges are romantic with greats views! Certainly a place to come back!!! We loved it!!!
reviews.title: wonderful place

aka: Hanglip Mountain Hotel Entabeni Game Reserve
description: Discover the exclusive Hanglip Mountain Lodge with its 10 luxury en-suite thatched rooms on the lower escarpment of the malaria-free Entabeni Safari Conservancy, surrounded by wetlands and plains. This secluded lodge is refreshingly alluring with its unique blend of luxury and true African wilderness with views stretching over the lake and plains to Hanglip Mountain and the Waterberg Range.
